name: neurotrader-monorepo
description: Neurotrader monorepo - Next.js frontend + FastAPI backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm -C frontend dev" "cd api && uvicorn main:app --reload"
scripts.lint: pnpm -C frontend lint && cd api && ruff check .
scripts.format: pnpm -C frontend format && cd api && ruff format .
scripts.type-check: pnpm -C frontend type-check && cd api && mypy src/ main.py --ignore-missing-imports
scripts.test: pnpm -C frontend test && cd api && pytest -q
